name: Sajilni Ltd
description: Developer of event management platform designed to help in event management and ticket booking. The company's platform helps event promoters and venue owners create, promote, sell and manage events online and increase ticket sales, it also helps to manage attendees, extract reports and send invitations to all kinds of events, providing event organizers with a complete event management platform that is simple, convenient and easy to use.
